body: I send one image to 10 contacts and after that I check sender username. It blocked. Is there any way to avoid this block.

comment_data.body:
@faisalcse Seriously, most of the question people ask, are already solved. There is a search tab above.
![searchhhhh](http://f.cl.ly/items/25050v2T2S0n1P1X2F0A/12.jpg) 

#761 
#757
I have read out the articles and the conversation, but cannot came to know how to avoid. Please I would like to request you to help in this regard.

@faisalcse did you really read it?, the solution is in there:

1. Login
2. Sync contacts
3. Send Presence Suscription
4. Send Typing
5. Send Paused
6. Send Message
7. Pool Messages

Chat with people that have added you into their contact list. And do not send big ammount of messages, thats it.

The username I used for login, is it mendatory to synchronise with that username? 
Or if I synchronise contacts with one username and I will login another username to send?
If you use a other script only for sync, and other for speak... its Good? Im using 2 differents scripts.
@codeBrothers if you are using the same WhatsApp session, then yes
whatsapp session? Same login config? (identity, password, phone) or same *.dat file?
@CodersBrothers try it. #762

in the above you mentioned, 

3. Send Typing
4. Send Paused

how can we do this?

I was not joking. I follow your instruction. there are some terms, sometime didn't get that's why I get in touch with you. you are the experts.
I will prepare the code and back to you according to your given steps above.
Is there any time limit like within 24 hours I cannot send again with the same id?
If you're sending 100 messages, so, you are looking for bulk message, and we don't support this.
No. I want to send a message to 10 different contacts. Shall I have to send another 10 contacts with same id within 24 hours?

I sent 100 messages for 5 different contacts only connecting and while loop (using the same session).
I didn't have the contacts in my list, didn't sync, nothing, just connected and send.

Once I sent 1000 in 3 minutes to another number (all of the tests is my numbers).

I always have "rand(0,1000)" in the end of the messages.

So, I don't now what u can do :/

@CodersBrothers sync contacts and sendPresenceSuscription.

@faisalcse there is no limit if you are doing it right. Once you get blocked you wont be able to send messages anymore. **Tip:** Use the API the way the real mobile cleint works and everything will work fine.

@eliasjnior If you do that, you will be blocked by WhatsApp servers soon. That is not a solution. Also the "rand(0,1000)" is not a workaround. If you read the code and now how WhatsApp works (in general) you will know what to do :)

This is the correct way, follow this steps:

- Login
- Sync contacts
- Send Presence Suscription
- Send Typing
- Send Paused
- Send Message
- Pool Messages

**[UPDATE]:** Be sure the contact have added you to their contact list and you too.

@mgp25 I'm just "playing" with this API. Right now, I don't want use it, just testing. This "bulk test" was about 2 weeks ago, and I'm not blocked.

But, as @mgp25 said, "Use the API the way the real mobile cleint works and everything will work fine". Don't try to use to wrong things. If you try spam, will get block sometime... And if you don't like receive spams, don't do the same!

Guys,

I'm wondering if it is possible to use the API for building a kind of customer service tool. Whatspp would be a great tool to keep in touch with customer who need assistance for solving simple questions and doubts etc.

The whatsapp oficial client interface is perfect for the final user, but the person who is on the other side, lets say, an hypothetical customer service professional, would need a better UI, preferably a desktop web application with features like copy/paste and automatic shortcut texts (eg for sending protocol numbers) and so on.

I totally agree with you guys about the need to keep the service away from spammers, but i think using it the way i described here is very legit. Still i don't know if it would be possible due to the risk of service blocking... imagine lots of people using this channel for communicating with a company... how to handle the responses to everyone without being banned?

I think the best choice for you is the Yowsup. It's faster then WhatsAPI and you can develop a simple desktop application. If you use in the correctly way, it will work perfectly and you won't get blocked.
The same with WhatsAPI... But, it's better if you don't know Python (like me =D)

I'm already using yowsup (python lover here hehe)... but it seems that some features like contact syncing are not working properly and no planned updates for it. Anyway, i'll try to code something and maybe send a PR when i get there!

@mgp25 probably stick to yowsup as i'm using Django for this project. But certainly i'll take a close look at WhatsAPI to port what is eventually missing on yowsup.  

Thanks for your reply!
@mgp25 can you share your sync method with yowsup please?
@mgp25 its necesary make sendPresenceSubscription all times that you need send a message?

Whats happens if you sync 100 contacts and later you sync 5 and later you sync 100 other time?
How many times you can sync at day? infinite?
You can sync as many times as you want as long as you respect the BACKOFF timeout
I see each time it sync 30 contacts and per day 2 times with same sender id.
@CodersBrothers i use sendPresenceSubscription once for every user i interact in the same session, if you logout and login again, then you need to sendPresenceSubscription again
Logout its like close app in mobile device? Its necesary make sometimes logout?
@CodersBrothers is not neccesary, just if you logout. Logout is when you need to reconnect to WhatsApp Service

when you need to reconnect? or when you DONT need to reconnect? For example i close my script doing simply exit() in php. But at some minutes i can want connect other time.

And if i dont make logout, i need use sendPresenceSuscription each time? I dont understand how works this.
If you want to simulate as closely as possible to the mobile client, yes.
@mgp25 can you share your sync method with yowsup please?

@Marcorele i have to code it again, i did it when i was at the university. But i remember was seeing how WhatsAPI do it and change a few lines in yowsup, i tried a couple of times before it started working

Hello I done exactly what is written here and I'm still blocked, maybe somebody please make sense of how to send a message not to be blocked or no one could get in this situation? 
I would like an answer please it is very important to me 

Thanks

[Reference](https://github.com/venomous0x/WhatsAPI/issues/800#issuecomment-46901901)

All about being blocked is already answered. Read all this issue and the previous related issues, also there is a search bar above.
But I can not Read the total and it can not have possibly distracted Skype conference with my programmer.?
We did exactly what you said row line

Then you are doing something wrong because WhatsApp does not block for no reason. Spamming or abusing the service is one of the reasons to get banned. Inappropriate use, etc. If things are done correctly there is no problem.
Must not send the same message several times?
What is the law of spam? How do they identify?
Y U NOT write in the same comment? *sigh* i wont give support to people trying to send massive messages or stuff like that.
OK I will try to send a message with the question of what the law of the sending messages Is there a limit to the amount of sending or of the same message? I would like to help please!

omg....

 It is considered spam: sending massive messages (unspecified amount, could be 5 or 1 or whatever) or unwanted messages, sending messages to many people who are not synchronized by both users (sender- and the user is receiving the message), annoying users, etc etc. So yeah, you can use WhatsApp to do normal things like talk with friends/family.. blah blah blah.

After I send 8 essage, sender id becomes blocked.
Is there any update for sending message because I am using the script of before 4 months.

Please advise.

We dont support that kind of activity, it goes against the EULA. We dont support spamming.

https://github.com/mgp25/WhatsAPI-Official
is any way to send 1000 whatsapp message in 5 mins i have contacts in mysql database please help me?

Man, shut up! You are spamming. We don't support it.

@mrssam We are good people but we have agreed with WhatsApp EULA and **we DONT SPAM**. 

I have the repository with the latest WhatsApp features and latest code and give support, but we don't support spamming and that kind of behaviour.

And as @DurtyFree said, if you dont agreed with that then: 

You should consider contacting WhatsApp, email them with your number and explain what you'd like to do.
support@whatsapp.com

Regards.

Hi,
Thanks for contacting WhatsApp.
 We are working on answering everyone's
 question as soon as possible. In the meantime,
 please look at our FAQ to see if your question is answered there.
FAQ page: http://www.whatsapp.com/faq/

1) Your phone number in this format: + Country Code Phone Number
2) Your device model

Reading the WhatsApp FAQ, can we conclude that using WhatsApi constitutes violation of Terms of Service? Please see item 6 below:

Why am I seeing the message "Your number is no longer allowed to use our service"?

If you are unable to use WhatsApp and you are receiving the following message: Your number ... is no longer allowed to use our service this means that your WhatsApp account has been banned.

We ban accounts if we believe the account activity is in violation of our Terms of Service. Please review our Terms of Service to learn more about the appropriate uses of WhatsApp.

Be aware that the following actions are in violation of our Terms of Service:

1. Sending ads or any other form of commercial solicitation.
2. Sending spam or unsolicited messages.
3. Submitting content (in the status, profile pictures or messages) that is unlawful, obscene, threatening, harassing, hateful, racially or ethnically offensive or otherwise inappropriate.
4. Being annoying to other users.
5. Being a repeat infringer.
6. Using an automated system or an unauthorized / unofficial client application to send messages through WhatsApp.

We may not issue a warning before banning your account. If you think your account was banned by mistake you can email us and we will look into your case.

72 hours after your account has been been banned, your friends will no longer be able to see you in their Favorites / Select contact lists.

Please note that WhatsApp reserves the right to refuse service for any reason without prior notice, at our sole discretion.

If you see the message "Youre temporarily banned from WhatsApp", please read this article.

Cheers, 
WhatsApp Support Team

Hi mrssam,

Please tell whatsapp that you're using the following device (as contained in whatsapi Constants declaration)

const WHATSAPP_USER_AGENT = 'WhatsApp/2.11.339 Android/4.0.4 Device/GalaxyS3';

In short, just tell them you're using Samsung Galaxy S3 with Android 4.0.4

Please let us know their response. Maybe if they accept your request, we can follow suit.

Otherwise, just be prepared to be banned due to violating their Terms of Service... sigh!

To check on whether your students have whatsapp in their phone, do this:

https://v.whatsapp.net/v2/exist?in=<the phone number>&cc=<the country code>

for example, enter the following in your browser : 
https://v.whatsapp.net/v2/exist?in=012XXXXXXX&cc=XX 
(replace X with the appropriate numbers, where "in" is the phone number without the country code and "cc" is the country code)

of course, to do this for all students, you'd have to loop this code in an SSL CURL

So, finishing what @mgp25 said... @mrssam, you can close this now :)

Ok, I have read all the issues here regarding number block. I followed this process to send a message, 

Login
sendClientConfig
sendGetServerProperties
Sync Contacts
Receive Messages
Send Typing
Send Message
Pool Messages

I have set sleep(1) after both Send Typing and Send Message. I have my script as such that it sends a message to the contact only when it receives a message from them. It was working fine for over 3 months now but yesterday the number suddenly got blocked. I checked the logs, incoming messages and outgoing messages are almost same in number. I have not sent broadcasts too. Can you please give me an insight on what might have gone wrong?

I sync all contacts in my list once per session, and then follow the typing - sleep - send message - sleep - poll message process. There are over 500 contacts in my list currently. Can this sync cause number block?

@mgp25 I'm not using the API to send (unwanted) spam to unkown users

here a brief resume of the application I'm building
users can subscribe themselves to a "newsletter" by sending a message (like "{company name} on") to the phone of my client (over whatsapp)
from that moment on they are followers and are subscribed to the "newsletter" and will recieve messages send by my client (text, images, links, video, ect)
they can send the message "{company name} off" when they don't want to recieve the "newsletter" anymore (also over whatsapp)
my client can also view different kind of statistics and directly chat to a follower (besides sending a "newsletter")

my question for you is, can I use the WhatsAPI for an service/application like this?
if I can use it for an application like this, then I know I'm just using the wrong methods to send these messages and have to change the code, otherwise I will just know it isn't allowed to use the WhatsAPI this way

@glenn1001  WhatsAPI can be used for your requirement, however it doesn't mean WhatsAPP is happy with it. If all your User have your number in their address book and yours, and then you are sending to them, it won't be a problem. But you need to find a fine balance between spamming (over sending is spamming as well) and over sending.
We need some insider information, about their system handling, working on it.

I'm very surprised whatsapp banned our number, we hate spam, we don't spam, we use Keywords that the users send and our system answer their requests using all the recommended steps (ie. sync,sendpresence,typing,pause(based on text lenght), stoptyping, etc..) and whatsapp banned our number, we have no idea why? Anyone please could help us to find out what happened? We also never send the same text as we insert a different greeting and goodbye to break patterns. We are a FM radio with around 5000 subscribers and we never send messages to them at least they send a keyword.. obviously they have us added in their contact lists.. please help...
